name: Snake with a Hundred Mage Hands
movement: swim, walk, and climb at 30 feet
description: A small monstrosity with a unique magical ability, surrounded by one hundred spectral hands that can manipulate objects and distract enemies.
memorable: Its ability to use magical hands for various tasks while remaining difficult to target makes it a unique threat.
goals: To disrupt enemy actions and create confusion in battle using its magical hands.
relations: Related to other magical creatures and entities that utilize trickery and stealth.
environment: Typically found in areas where it can use its swimming and climbing abilities effectively, such as forests or swamps.
strengths: High Dexterity and Intelligence allow for effective stealth and tactical plays.
weaknesses: Low Strength and Charisma lead to physical frailty and difficulties in social situations.
attacks: Can make two bite attacks per turn, dealing consistent damage, and unleash a flurry of spectral fists as an area attack.
most_powerful_ability: One Hundred Mage Hands allows for exceptional manipulation and tactical distraction of enemies.
senses: Blindsight up to 10 feet provides it with awareness of its surroundings without relying on sight.
skills: Proficient in stealth, allowing it to move unnoticed, and has a reasonable perception skill.
additional_information: Utilizes spot-on tactical plays to undermine opponents.
The spectral hands cannot take damage or be targeted, making them highly effective.
Ability to perform multiple Dexterity (Sleight of Hand) checks in one action greatly increases its versatility.
Can disrupt enemy formations with its Flying Fists ability.
Relies heavily on its magical abilities rather than physical prowess.
test_queries: snake that uses magical hands for deception
small magical creature that distracts enemies
versatile trickster with a hundred hands
cunning snake that excels in stealth tactics
monstrosity that manipulates objects with hands
